pullRequest.title: Rename extension hibernate-search-elasticsearch to hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch
pullRequest.bodyText:
@gsmet As discussed together.
There's been talks about introducing another Hibernate Search extension that targets Elasticsearch, but is not tied to Hibernate ORM, allowing the use of Hibernate Search to replicate data from arbitrary datastores (MongoDB, ...).
When that happens (no schedule at the moment), we will end up with an extension named hibernate-search-elasticsearch that bundles Hibernate Search, targets Elasticsearch, but cannot be used by MongoDB users, who must rely on another extension, probably named hibernate-search-standalone-elasticsearch.
Even worse, the configuration prefix quarkus.hibernate-search. will be dedicated to Hibernate Search configuration within Hibernate ORM, any other extensions will have to use a different prefix such as quarkus.hibernate-search-standalone..
This will be confusing.
By inserting "orm" into the name of the Hibernate Search ORM+Elasticsearch extension, I intend to clarify that this extension is about Hibernate ORM.
We should add this to the migration guide:
## Hibernate Search ORM + Elasticsearch (Preview)

* You should update your Maven/Gradle dependencies: replace any occurrence of the artifact ID `hibernate-search-elasticsearch` with `hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch`
* You should update your configuration: replace any occurrence of the prefix `quarkus.hibernate-search.` with `quarkus.hibernate-search-orm.`

commit.message:
Move Hibernate Search extension code to directories named 'hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch'

Instead of just 'hibernate-search-elasticsearch'

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Rename the Hibernate Search extension artifacts to *hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch*

Instead of *hibernate-search-elasticsearch*

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Add a few keywords to the Hibernate Search extension

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Use 'hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch-quickstart' for references to the Hibernate Search quickstart

Instead of 'hibernate-search-elasticsearch-quickstart'.

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Move the Hibernate Search extension documentation to guides/hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch

Instead of guides/hibernate-search-elasticsearch

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

nodes.bodyText: I would have spaces around the +?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -11,7 +11,7 @@
     <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
 
     <artifactId>quarkus-hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch-deployment</artifactId>
-    <name>Quarkus - Hibernate Search - Elasticsearch - Deployment</name>
+    <name>Quarkus - Hibernate Search - ORM+Elasticsearch - Deployment</name>

commit.message:
Mention ORM in the name of Hibernate Search extensions

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Rename the configuration prefix for the Hibernate Search extension to 'quarkus.hibernate-search-orm.'

Instead of 'quarkus.hibernate-search.'.

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>
